title: In First, Ukraine Uses U.S.-Supplied Long-Range ATACMS – Zelensky
description: The United States had not previously said publicly that it had delivered the missile systems to Kyiv.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: ‘I Will Be Rehabilitated’: Jailed Navalny Ally Chanysheva Challenges Prison Sentence
description: In a letter sent from prison, Lilia Chanysheva said she “finds solace in my awareness of my innocence.”
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russian Meat Producer Faces Criminal Probe After 'Appalling' Waste Leak Threatens Locals, Baikal
description: The leak at a manure storage pit has sent mass amounts of animal waste flowing into local waterways and threatens an “environmental disaster.”
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Half of Russian Soldiers Wounded in Ukraine Require Amputation – Official
description: The 54% rate of required amputations identified by Russia's deputy labor minister may indicate the difficulties faced by the Armed Forces in Ukraine.

title: 16 Russians Killed, 9 Missing in Israel-Hamas War – Envoy

title: Putin Faces No Real Opposition, Spokesman Says

title: Russian Opposition Leader Navalny Condemns Lawyers' Arrest
description: Navalny said the lawyers were targeted for their "professional activity" and that it was part of a campaign to further isolate him since he had his sentence extended to 19 years.

description: The vote moves Russia closer to abandoning a landmark agreement that prohibits the testing of nuclear weapons.

title: Russia Moves to Revoke Nuclear Test Ban Treaty
description: The move comes after President Vladimir Putin said earlier this month he was "not ready to say" whether Russia needed to carry out live nuclear tests.

title: Putin Meets Hungary’s Orban, Praises Developing Ties
description: Orban has been one of the only leaders in the EU to maintain ties with Russia following the invasion of Ukraine.

title: Russia Says 'No Proof' North Korea Sending Weapons

title: Putin Arrives in Beijing Seeking Diplomatic, Economic Support from ‘Dear Friend’ Xi

title: Ukraine Says Strikes Russian-Occupied Airfields in East

title: Russia Says Polish Vote Results Unlikely to Improve Strained Ties
